name: Maenad In A Trip
description: Maenads the "mad women" were priestesses of the Dionysian cult. Their name translates as "raving ones", known as Bassarids, Bacchae, or Bacchantes. Part of The Recursive Series a collection of digital arts inspired by the illustrations of the artist M.C.Escher and mystery noire TV shows from the early 20th century. This piece of art was kindly donated by Luiz Andr√© Gama for the #objkts4palestine initiative.  All proceeds go directly to The Palestine Children's Relief Fund (https://www.pcrf.net/).  Twitter: @luizandregama :: Hic et Nunc: https://linktr.ee/luizandregama :: Fundraiser Page: https://pcrf1.z2systems.com/objkts4palestine
